About Me

I am a software engineer for several years now. My skills include:

  • iOS development, both in Swift and Objective-C
  • Web development, using Laravel and VueJS
  • Software Architecture

I currently work at AdNovum, a company based in Switzerland.

Personal Projects

Judo Shiai is an iOS application for displaying a judo scoreboard on your iPad, iPhone or external screen.
